arg.name: ur_joint_limit_params
arg.doc: YAML file containing the joint limit values

arg.name: ur_kinematics_params
arg.doc: YAML file containing the robot's kinematic parameters. These will be different for each robot as they contain the robot's calibration.

arg.name: ur_physical_params
arg.doc: YAML file containing the phycical parameters of the robots

arg.name: ur_visual_params
arg.doc: YAML file containing the visual model of the robots

arg.name: ur_transmission_hw_interface
arg.doc: The hardware_interface to expose for each joint in the simulated robot (one of: [PositionJointInterface, VelocityJointInterface, EffortJointInterface])

arg.name: ur_safety_limits
arg.doc: If True, enable the safety limits controller

arg.name: ur_safety_pos_margin
arg.doc: The lower/upper limits in the safety controller

arg.name: ur_safety_k_position
arg.doc: Used to set k position in the safety controller

param.name: robot_description
param.command: $(find xacro)/xacro '$(find ur_robotiq_connector)/urdf/ur10e_3f-gripper.xacro' ur_joint_limit_params:=$(arg ur_joint_limit_params) ur_kinematics_params:=$(arg ur_kinematics_params) ur_physical_params:=$(arg ur_physical_params) ur_visual_params:=$(arg ur_visual_params) ur_transmission_hw_interface:=$(arg ur_transmission_hw_interface) ur_safety_limits:=$(arg ur_safety_limits) ur_safety_pos_margin:=$(arg ur_safety_pos_margin) ur_safety_k_position:=$(arg ur_safety_k_position)
